about_the_game:
This is an asset pack for creating explorative-adventure games in RPG Maker MZ and RPG Maker MV.
The assets are designed with a pastel-colored themed child's room in mind, allowing users to create games with a cute but modern taste!

◇Asset Features◇
・A total of 4 character types: 1 hero and 3 NPC characters, complete with walking and various animations
・Furniture objects such as drawers
・Walls and floors designed to feel like a bedroom, as well as assets representing backyards (e.g. sky, grass)
・UI elements such as text windows with character icons and speech bubbles.
Plus many more that suits all your needs to make a cute – (cough) kawaii game space!

◇Contents◇
・Character：4 types
・faces：4 types
・UI Elements - window with icons and speech bubble：12 types
・Tiles：9 pieces (768 x 768px）
※Tile type assets are made at 48 x 48 per tile size.
※Some objects are also available as tiles.


・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・Rights must be indicated when using assets.
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.

This is an asset pack for creating explorative-adventure games in RPG Maker MZ and RPG Maker MV.
The assets are designed with a pastel-colored themed child's room in mind, allowing users to create games with a cute but modern taste!

◇Asset Features◇
・A total of 4 character types: 1 hero and 3 NPC characters, complete with walking and various animations
・Furniture objects such as drawers
・Walls and floors designed to feel like a bedroom, as well as assets representing backyards (e.g. sky, grass)
・UI elements such as text windows with character icons and speech bubbles.
Plus many more that suits all your needs to make a cute – (cough) kawaii game space!

・faces：4 types
